application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Mature Irish Yew (applicants ref. T1) - Fell to ground level (exempt works).1 x Twin Stemmed Yew (applicants ref. T2) - Remove small suckering growth at the base of the tree, trim back branches encroaching over the tennis court fence to convenient growth points.1 x Mature Yew (applicants ref. T3) - Thin crown by approximately 20% including the removal of dead wood and re-shaped as necessary to provide a more balanced specimen. Branches overhanging the tennis court fence should be trimmed back to convenient growth points whilst retaining the height and basic shape.Line of Limes (applicants ref. T4) - Pollard to previous pruning points. Remove dead wood as required removing epicormic growth. Ensure are cuts are to pruning points to encourage regrowth and limit any die back.
site_name: Tennis CourtRotherwick RoadLondonNW11 7DG
